profile:
Vivek Gupta BCIN Building Code Specialist
itipermit.com
647-973-1733
itipermit@gmail.com
Removal of old Wooden Steps and Railings, New Concrete Steps with Glass Railings Construction and Permit
For certain works as, structural, excavation, second unit basement - 
No construction or renovations should be started without a building permit.
In Ontario any renovation involving above works must be designed by a BCIN designer and Engineers must also be either BCIN certified or hire a BCIN designer for these works too. It is the Law.
Sample of designer work:
The definition for dwelling unit “shall mean one or more habitable rooms designed or capable of being used together as a single and separate housekeeping unit by one person or jointly by two (2) or more persons, containing its own kitchen and sanitary facilities, with a private entrance from outside of the unit itself”. Please redesign the layouts to suit.
Sample of designer work:
The 2-2x4 lintels cannot span 3’-8” as per OBC Table A-15 and the lintel has to be sized to carry the point load from the ground floor window. Additionally the detail showing the lintel framing is incorrect, the lintel is to be on the vertical plane.
Price and time Guaranteed.
Side Entrance, interior Renovations, Second Unit Registration, Kitchener, Waterloo, Cambridge, Oshawa
